short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all mentions of coronavirus with Miley Cyrus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our timelines are filled with the *thing*, this will remove any mention of it and replace it with Miley Cyrus, you know, because it rhymes. Time to eradicate it from the web.

This add-on is for entertainment purposes only.
